DOC.brief_summary: Study PIM4973g multicenter , international , open-label Phase II trial . Participants metastatic renal cell carcinoma progress VEGF target therapy randomize 1:1 two group either receive daily GDC-0980 everolimus orally .
DOC.brief_title: Study GDC-0980 Versus Everolimus Participants With Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma Who Have Progressed Following Vascular Endothelial Growth Factor- ( VEGF ) Targeted Therapy
DOC.criteria: Histologically cytologically document , incurable metastatic renal cell carcinoma clearcell component progress within 6 month stop VEGFtargeted therapy Disease measurable per Response Evaluation Criteria Solid Tumors Version 1.1 ( RECIST v1.1 ) Karnofsky performance status great equal ( > = ) 70 percent ( % ) Adequate hematologic end organ function For female participant childbearing potential male participant partner childbearing potential , agreement use two effective form contraception continue use duration study Any anticancer therapy , include chemotherapy , biologic target therapy , herbal therapy , hormonal therapy , radiotherapy , within 5 halflives ( systemic agent ) 2 week , whichever short , prior Day 1 .
